Timecandy6.name: Timecandy6
Timecandy6.desc: READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY. This purchase has a 50% chance for the coveted 72 hr candy, and a 50% chance to just be a lame 12 hour candy. Ok you can stop reading now.

EquipmentCape0.name: EquipmentCape0
EquipmentCape0.desc: Gives you a random cape, it could be any one of them currently in IdleOn! There are 14 possibilities, including the ones from special bundles!

EquipmentNametag3.name: EquipmentNametag3
EquipmentNametag3.desc: Instead of telling the world that you dropped 2500 gems with the chat ring, show them with this nametag instead! Comes with a 40% Drop Rate bonus.

Quest77.name: Quest77
Quest77.desc: Gives you a pocketwatch that fast forwards a day, restocking shops and triggering various daily rewards and systems. One use only, of course.

desc: Gives you a Compost Bag usable item. Use it in your player inventory to instantly get 6 hours of Farming growth for all your crops, instantly! This item restocks each day.
Gives you a Compost Bag usable item. Use it in your player inventory to instantly get 4 hours of Farming growth for all your crops, instantly! This item restocks each day.
Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!! Yippie!!!
10% OFF NORMAL PRICE! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded!
30 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town!
Excuse me sir, but would you be interested in some of my balls? You are?? Great! I have some here just for you, free of charge! 1 gem fee though.
500 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town! +33% better value compared to smol ball pack!
23% OFF NORMAL PRICE! 500 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town!
Gives you a Summoner Stone usable item Use it in your player inventory to instantly get 6 hours of Summoning Essence, instantly! This item restocks each day.
